user.title: Setup TFA.me station
user.description:
Please enter IP or station ID of your TFA.me station.
- 9 digit station ID: 'XXX-XXX-XXX'
- mDNS name:'tfa-me-XXX-XXX-XXX.local'
- Get IP: Press and hold button '+' for 5 seconds at your device.

data.multiple_entities: Sensors received via different stations are different entities. When you have only one station don't check this box.
